sentences.en: Carol was absent-minded and a little slow on the uptake.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔心不在焉，反应有点迟钝。

sentences.en: Dinitropheol exerted its effect on sucrose uptake or secretion into the sieve tubes.
sentences.cn: 二硝基酚影响蔗糖的吸收或者分化到筛管里.

sentences.en: Glucosinolates can interfere with uptake of iodine by the thyroid, for example.
sentences.cn: 例如,硫代葡萄糖苷能干涉甲状腺对碘的吸收.

sentences.en: Higher salt concentrations alone may inhibit ion uptake.
sentences.cn: 单单只是盐浓度高就会阻碍离子吸收.

sentences.en: Measures which minimize systemic uptake reduce toxicity.
sentences.cn: 凡是足以减少周身吸收的方法,都能减少毒性反应.

sentences.en: She is not an intellectual, but is quick on the uptake.
sentences.cn: 她并不是个才智非凡的人，但理解力很强。

sentences.en: Soybeans have rarely been used as an experimental plant in nutrient uptake studies.
sentences.cn: 在研究养分吸收问题时,很少用大豆作供试验用作物.

sentences.en: That boy is quick in the uptake.
The curve of nutrients uptake by poinsettia was sigmoid.
sentences.cn: 一品红养分吸收曲线呈“S” 型.

sentences.en: The doctor advised me to reduce the salt uptake.
sentences.cn: 医生建议我减少盐的摄入.

sentences.en: The drug increases the number of red cells in the blood, enhancing oxygen uptake by 10 percent.
sentences.cn: 这种药增加了血液里的红细胞数量，从而将摄氧量提高了10%。

sentences.en: There has been a high uptake of the free training.
sentences.cn: 免费培训有很多人参加。

sentences.en: There is the potential of uptake of soil, inorganic nitrogen by the roots of the semi - parasite.
sentences.cn: 半 寄生的根系有可能吸取土壤的无机氮.

sentences.en: They developed paper napkins with a greater uptake of liquids.
sentences.cn: 他们发明了液体吸附能力很强的餐巾纸.

sentences.en: This study explored teachers corrective feedback, and its relationship with students uptake.
sentences.cn: 本文主要研究教师的纠错反馈(纠错)及其与学生的接纳之间的关系.

phrases.phrase: be quick (或 slow) on the uptake

trans.tran_cn: <口>举起，<非正>（尤指对新事物的）理解力，<术>摄入，<矿>上风井
